Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires certain departmental security staff who interact with the incarcerated population to wear a body camera
Summary: Requires departmental security staff below the rank of captain who interact with the incarcerated population to wear a body camera while acting in the performance of their duties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring certain departmental security staff who interact with the incarcerated population to wear a body camera
